metadata.dc:description: The management of the complexity supposes important opportunities of development and needs from the application of specific models of management for each of the different areas from the hospital. Into any case the decisions of outsourcing already are changing the conception of the hospitals of the future collaborating in that his management is slightly less complex (AU)
